headline: How much to invest in Pepsi for $1,000 in annual dividends (2026)
summary: PepsiCo (PEP) has paid dividends without interruption for over 50 years, making it a reliable income generator for investors seeking steady cash flow. The beverage and snack giant currently trades (as of January 16) at $146.60 per share with an annual dividend of $5.69, according to data from Yahoo ...
